Title: Ruby Shoals
Plot: While on the campaign trail through North Carolina, Gil John blows off a meeting with the governor to visit Ruby Shoals where he becomes re-inspired about his campaign. Robert's pro-fracking visit to a constituent's home in Pennsylvania does not go as planned.
Writer: Peter Gwinn, Alison McDonald, Garry Trudeau
GuestStars: Yara Martinez, Julie White, Richard Cox, Kobi Libii, Bjorn Dupaty, Alicia Sable, Molly Kate Bernard, Natalie Gold, Sue Jean Kim, Kevin Geer, Jan Leslie Harding, Nick Reynolds, Christina Sajous, Devon Diffenderfer
